availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married Missouri J. Barnes. Father of Mary E. Barnes. Farmer in Marshall County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 778
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Marshall County Marriages, Film #000321353, p. 905
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, p. 185B
Find A Grave, "Name (Birth-Death)," Memorial #26037100, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/26037100 (accessed September 4, 2019).
